start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Zendesk Support API, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated.

subdomain.title: Subdomain
subdomain.description: This is your Zendesk subdomain that can be found in your account URL. For example, in https://{MY_SUBDOMAIN}.zendesk.com/, where MY_SUBDOMAIN is the value of your subdomain.

email.title: Email
email.description: The user email for your Zendesk account.

api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: The value of the API token generated. See the docs for more information.
